props.name: as
props.description: The element or component this component should render as. Can be overwritten by asChild.

props.name: asChild
props.description:
Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.

Read our Composition guide for more details.

props.name: forceMount
props.description: Used to force mounting when more control is needed. Useful when controlling animation with Vue animation libraries.

props.name: value
props.description: A unique value that associates the content with a trigger.
